· Unit Size:W270xD340xH60mm
· Actual Power:1800W
· Supply Voltage:120V~50/60Hz
· Control:Push button,11 keys,15 blue LEDs,1x two and a half digit segment display(BLUE)

· Timer:Yes
· Display Power & Temperature level:9 & 8

· Container information:1 pcs/gift box,4 pcs/carton
